SaveMon-your-personal-assistant: SaveMon is your personal financial assistant that will help you skillfully manage your personal budget.With our app, you will always know where your money is going, and you will be able to plan your spending more efficiently.
happy-to-see-you-again: It's nice to see you again!
fill-info-below-and-enjoy: Enter the information below and enjoy using the app:)
fill-name-and-surname-below: Please enter your first and last name below
what-purpose-you-to-save: For what purpose do you want to save up?
on-delete-sum-returns-on-balance: When deleted, the amount will be returned to the balance
which-operation-type-you-want-to-add: What type of operation do you want to add?
which-operation-kind-you-are-interested-: What type of operation are you interested in?
HOUSE: Housing and communal services, rent, home renovation
Its-not-just-app: This is not just an application for calculating income and expenses
savemon-description: With SaveMon, you can: keep records of your income and expenses in a user-friendly and intuitive interface, analyze your expenses using visual graphs and charts to get a clear picture of your financial situation, plan your financial future with our balance forecasting feature. SaveMon is designed to help you take control of your finances and achieve financial stability. Download the app today and start managing your finances with ease!
